MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD2 postcode areas of Lauder. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.17pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to locate and repair the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:40pm on Thursday 4th February 2021.
